House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08414
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE OFFICE FOR SOCIAL WELFARE ATTACHEE, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 8042, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE MIGRANT WORKERS AND OVERSEAS FILIPINO ACT OF 1995, AS AMENDED, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Recognizes the significant role of social welfare attachés in the provision of appropriate social services to our overseas workers and their families, by institutionalizing their permanent posting and/or deployment to Philippine Foreign Posts. States that the DSWD shall deploy such attachés to manage cases of OFWs needing psychosocial services and Overseas Filipinos in distress such as victims of trafficking, illegal recruitment, sexually-abused, maltreated/mistreated Overseas Filipinos, abandoned/neglected children and vulnerable sectors.
